title: misc/gdb: no gdb on OS X Mavericks
body:
OS X Mavericks's Xcode does not ship with gdb anymore. It ships the LLVM-based lldb, but
lldb cannot understand our dwarf information.

No idea what to do. What I'd *like* to do is remove all pretense of supporting gdb.

We should have some story for what you're supposed to do on Mavericks by Go 1.3.
